#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install pid-trap
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`pid-trap` |`usage: pid-trap pid command [args ...]`

#### Examples
```bash
sleep 5 &
pid-trap $! echo beep
```
